function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate early detection due to reliance on limited physiological indicators leading to delayed diagnosis.","Impact":"Delayed treatment and increased transmission of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Incorporation of a wider range of physiological characteristics for early detection and exploration of feature selection and extraction techniques to prevent overfitting.","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence techniques, feature selection, feature extraction.","People":"Healthcare professionals, public health authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations."},{"Description":"Radiation exposure risks from chest radiography imaging for COVID-19 diagnosis.","Impact":"Increased health risks from radiation exposure for patients and healthcare professionals.","Mitigation":"Development and use of alternative diagnostic techniques that do not pose radiation exposure risks.","Technologies":"Non-radiation diagnostic imaging techniques, AI-based diagnosis.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Medical device manufacturers, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"Spectrum bias in ADMs due to underrepresentation of geographic regions and population samples, leading to inaccurate predictions and diagnoses.","Impact":"Unreliable forecasts and inaccurate diagnoses for certain populations.","Mitigation":"Improved representation of diverse geographic regions and population samples in training data to prevent spectrum bias.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, data augmentation techniques.","People":"Data scientists, researchers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Research organizations, public health agencies."}]}
